Implication: "A football coach talks with his player in front of the team and the crowd."
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsTalkWith(a,b))) & (forall f (forall e (forall d ( IsTalkWith(d,e) ->   IsInFrontOfTeam(f)))))) -> (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsTalkWith(a,b) and IsInFrontOfTeam(c) and IsInCrowd(c)))))
